categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Cibaba was an Azumel Jedi Master of the Jedi Order during the High Republic Era. Considered old, the Azumel trained the Tholothian Padawan Ty Yorrick, showing her how to construct her lightsaber. Yorrick later left the Jedi, thinking of Cibaba's disapproval over her modifications to her lightsaber when she worked as a mercenary.
